title: DirectoryCopy
name: DirectoryCopy
description: Copies the contents of a directory to a destination directory.

arguments.name: source
arguments.description: Pathname of directory from which you copy content.

arguments.name: destination
arguments.description: Path of the destination directory. If not an absolute path, it is relative to the source directory.

arguments.name: recurse
arguments.description: If true, copies the subdirectories, otherwise only the files in the source directory.

arguments.name: filter
arguments.description:
Filter to be used to filter the data copied:
- A string that uses "*" as a wildcard, for example, "*.cfm"
- a UDF (User defined Function) using the following pattern "functioname(String path):boolean", the function is run for every single file, if the function returns true, then the file is will be added to the list otherwise it will be omitted

arguments.name: createPath
arguments.description: if set to false, expects all parent directories to exist, true (default) will generate necessary directories
